channel.title: 路透财经

item.title: 观看：比特币突破 65,000 美元，创下两年来的新高。资金浪潮使比特币接近历史最高水平
item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 观看：梅西百货的控制权争夺战更上一层楼。投资者 Arkhouse 和 Brigade Capital 周日表示，他们已经提高了对这家连锁百货公司的出价。目前，他们的出价约为 66 亿美元。
item.description:
WATCH: The battle for control of Macy’s just stepped up a notch. Investors Arkhouse and Brigade Capital on Sunday said they had raised their offer for the department store chain. Their bid now values the company at around $6.6 billion https://t.co/v4wkVpDktY pic.twitter.com/qMcskhF0Pb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 因 "重大缺陷 "披露而遭抛售后，NYCB 股价有望反弹

item.title: 看据投资者 Arkhouse Management 和 Brigade Capital Management 称，梅西百货的收购报价已提高至 66 亿美元，而此前该连锁百货公司以报价过低为由拒绝了他们的收购提议。
item.description:
WATCH: The buyout offer for Macy's has been raised to $6.6 billion, according to investors Arkhouse Management and Brigade Capital Management, after the department store chain rebuffed their prior proposal as too low https://t.co/v4wkVpCMEq pic.twitter.com/BA7Ay7d9hd

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 赢创表示 2024 年不可能复苏，计划裁员 2000 人
item.description:
Evonik says recovery unlikely in 2024, plans 2,000 job cuts https://t.co/zlZYnr0WN9 pic.twitter.com/OaW1yV2PHL

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 泰国总理办公厅主任表示，泰国经济正处于 "危急关头"，并强调有必要采取刺激措施，以解决家庭债务问题、促进旅游业发展和吸引外国投资。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Thailand's economy is in a ‘critical situation,’ the prime minister's chief of staff said, stressing the need for stimulus measures aimed at tackling household debt, boosting tourism and attracting foreign investment. More here: https://t.co/7F3JIpRLPU pic.twitter.com/6FWLas65fv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 日本主要股票基准指数首次突破 40,000 点，今年以来在公司治理改革和低廉估值的刺激下继续快速攀升至新高。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Japan's main stock benchmark tops the 40,000-point level for the first time, continuing a rapid rise to new peaks this year that has been spurred by corporate governance reform and cheap valuations. More here: https://t.co/3Dh4zZGsEr pic.twitter.com/QgiVC0Oa49

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 德国经济研究所（German Economic Institute）在一份文件中指出，如果美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）重新上台，并像他提议的那样大幅提高进口关税，那么到2028年，德国经济将至少萎缩1.2%。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Germany's economy would contract by at least 1.2% by 2028 should former US President Donald Trump regain office and hike import tariffs as much as he has proposed, the German Economic Institute argued in a paper. More here: https://t.co/uYpsvDjV2y

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 如果欧盟在未来几个月内禁止使用俄罗斯金属，欧洲和美国买家将积极争购中东铝，从而引发价格上涨，让人想起2018年对俄铝实施制裁时的情况。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
European and US buyers will compete aggressively for Middle Eastern aluminum if the European Union bans Russian metal in coming months, sparking price rises reminiscent of 2018 when sanctions were imposed on Rusal. More here: https://t.co/i6RntjtBtj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 观看：欧佩克+成员国同意将石油自愿减产协议延长至第二季度末，基本符合市场预期，同时俄罗斯承诺削减产量和出口，油价随之走高
item.description:
WATCH: Oil prices nudged higher after OPEC+ members agreed to extend voluntary oil output cuts to the end of the second quarter, largely in line with market expectations, while Russia pledged to cut production and exports https://t.co/vtbJfHFDR1 pic.twitter.com/kBGmsJdKKt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行将于周四召开会议，随着通胀率的走低，市场将密切关注降息的动向。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The European Central Bank meets on Thursday, with markets eyeing any nudge towards an interest rate cut as inflation weakens. More here: https://t.co/fyyam2xOew

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 瑞士国家银行年度亏损 36 亿美元

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 德国化工集团赢创（Evonik）表示，预计2024年不会出现经济复苏迹象，并宣布到2026年将在全球范围内裁员多达2000人，以削减成本。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
German chemicals group Evonik said it expected no signs of a recovery in 2024 and announced up to 2,000 job cuts worldwide by 2026 in a bid to cut costs. More here: https://t.co/qZY5AOVL0e

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: SoftwareOne股东废除向贝恩出售公司的协议
item.description:
SoftwareOne shareholders scrap agreement to sell company to Bain https://t.co/CAZrwUIrXV pic.twitter.com/JlNn8zbcnC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 印度要求科技公司在公开发布 "不可靠 "或正在试用的人工智能工具之前，必须获得印度政府的批准，并指出这些工具还应该标明可能会为用户查询返回错误答案。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
India has asked tech firms to seek its approval before the public release of artificial intelligence tools that are ‘unreliable’ or under trial, noting they should also be labelled for the potential to return wrong answers for user queries. More here: https://t.co/MgcRP3YI7q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：大众汽车电池部门的老板告诉 @路透社，在其工厂投入运营和统一电池单元投入使用之前，大众汽车不会考虑将其电池部门在股票市场上市，这基本上排除了在 2026 年之前上市的可能性。
item.description:
Exclusive: Volkswagen will not consider a stock market listing for its battery unit until its factories are up and running and its unified battery cell is in use, the division's boss told @Reuters, essentially ruling out a possible IPO before 2026 https://t.co/asu7uWqlBI

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 随着科技股的飙升，日本主要股票基准首次突破 40,000 点。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Japan's main stock benchmark breached the 40,000-point level for the first time, as technology shares soared. More here: https://t.co/3Dh4zZGsEr pic.twitter.com/BgIZUCwwf1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024
